![](images/clipboard-2414267684.png)

Our team will explore to create nowcasting models that can precisely forecast the future direction of the Singapore private housing market. The objective is to utilize these models to provide stakeholders, including homebuyers, sellers, investors, and policy makers, with timely and convenient access to predictive data via visual analytics.
